alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Edgefield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:39PM EDT until August 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southern Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Lexington County in central South Carolina... Aiken County in central South Carolina... South central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gloverville, or near Clearwater, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Aiken, North Augusta, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Batesburg-Leesville, Aiken Mall, Oak Grove, Red Bank, Clearwater, Belvedere, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, New Ellenton, Jackson, Gaston, Edgefield County Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, and West Columbia Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia near mile marker 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 58. Interstate 26 between mile markers 110 and 129. Interstate 520 in Georgia near mile marker 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 11. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
